name: Create or update contacts in Teamleader from new leads in Sharpspring
description:
This template regularly checks for new leads in SharpSpring and uses the retrieved information to create or update contacts in Teamleader. 

The template is scheduled to run every 15 minutes. You can change the schedule after you set up the template by clicking the clock icon on the first module.

We use email address as the key between the two systems.
